page.title: 04OPINIONS OF MARTON/NUNTHORPE
page.content: Marton and Nunthorpe is a pleasant area in which to live. The shops and facilities of Middlesbrough are within easy reach yet we escape the smoke of the industry. Within easy reach are Roseberry Topping,The Eston Hills and Cleveland Hills. Within our area there are few recreational facilities, but these can be catered for in Middlesbrough. There is a great variety of housing. One house looks very old and has a thatched roof, while many houses have been built within the past ten to fifteen years. The newer houses must maintain 'open plan' gardens and many residents would like greater privacy. There is a considerable amount of turnover of residents on the estates with new families moving in constantly.
